title: Can we offer Sunnah before the athaan? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: the fifth question please explain can we offer sooner before I then the answer is no the sooner of a prayer whether it's Feder Lahore is only performed after the I than is cold because this is when the time is due if you if a juror that is at six o'clock a.m. and you pray ten minutes to six what did you pray he says soon little fuzzy fuzzy does not do how can you pray sinner and the time is not do so definitely not you cannot pray before the I than is called
